languages.text: "И это хорошо. Огонь и металл — это суть жизни. Люди — не черви, мы по-настоящему живы, только когда рвем на части врагов!"
"Good. Fire and metal are the essence of life. People aren't worms, we are truly alive only when we're ripping our enemies apart!"
languages.original_text: "И это хорошо. Огонь и металл — это суть жизни. Люди — не черви, мы по-настоящему живы, только когда рвем на части врагов!"

traits.locale_text: "Good. Fire and metal are the essence of life. People aren't worms, we are truly alive only when we're ripping our enemies apart!"
"Good. Fire and metal are the essence of life. People aren't worms, we are truly alive only when we're ripping our enemies apart!"
"Good. Fire and metal are the essence of life. People aren't worms, we are truly alive only when we're ripping our enemies apart!"
"Good. Fire and metal are the essence of life. People aren't worms, we are truly alive only when we're ripping our enemies apart!"
"Good. Fire and metal are the essence of life. People aren't worms, we are truly alive only when we're ripping our enemies apart!"

languages.text: “很好，火焰与金属才是生命的本质。人不是蛆虫，只有当我们撕碎敌人的时候，我们才真正地活着！”
languages.original_text: "Good. Fire and metal are the essence of life. People aren't worms, we are truly alive only when we're ripping our enemies apart!"

traits.locale_text: “很好，火焰与金属才是生命的本质。人不是蛆虫，只有当我们撕碎敌人的时候，我们才真正地活着！”

languages.text: «Bien. El fuego y el metal son la esencia de la vida. Los humanos no somos gusanos, ¡solo estamos verdaderamente vivos cuando despedazamos a nuestros enemigos!».
languages.original_text: "Good. Fire and metal are the essence of life. People aren't worms, we are truly alive only when we're ripping our enemies apart!"

traits.locale_text: «Bien. El fuego y el metal son la esencia de la vida. Los humanos no somos gusanos, ¡solo estamos verdaderamente vivos cuando despedazamos a nuestros enemigos!».

languages.text: 「素晴らしい。火と金属は生命の本質だ。人間は虫ケラとは違う。敵を切り裂くときこそ、真に生を感じられるのだ！」
languages.original_text: "Good. Fire and metal are the essence of life. People aren't worms, we are truly alive only when we're ripping our enemies apart!"

traits.locale_text: 「素晴らしい。火と金属は生命の本質だ。人間は虫ケラとは違う。敵を切り裂くときこそ、真に生を感じられるのだ！」

languages.text: "Gut. Feuer und Metall sind die Essenz des Lebens. Menschen sind keine Würmer, wir sind erst dann wirklich lebendig, wenn wir unsere Feinde in Stücke reißen!"
languages.original_text: "Good. Fire and metal are the essence of life. People aren't worms, we are truly alive only when we're ripping our enemies apart!"

traits.locale_text: "Gut. Feuer und Metall sind die Essenz des Lebens. Menschen sind keine Würmer, wir sind erst dann wirklich lebendig, wenn wir unsere Feinde in Stücke reißen!"

languages.text: « Bien. Le feu et le métal sont l'essence de la vie. Les gens ne sont pas des asticots. On est réellement vivants que lorsqu'on massacre nos ennemis ! »
languages.original_text: "Good. Fire and metal are the essence of life. People aren't worms, we are truly alive only when we're ripping our enemies apart!"

traits.locale_text: « Bien. Le feu et le métal sont l'essence de la vie. Les gens ne sont pas des asticots. On est réellement vivants que lorsqu'on massacre nos ennemis ! »

languages.text: "Güzel. Ateş ile metal hayatın özüdür. Pısırık değiliz sonuçta, yalnız düşmanlarımızı parçaladığımızda hayat doluyoruz!"
languages.original_text: "Good. Fire and metal are the essence of life. People aren't worms, we are truly alive only when we're ripping our enemies apart!"

traits.locale_text: "İyi. Ateş ile metal hayatın özüdür. Pısırık değiliz sonuçta, yalnız düşmanlarımızı parçaladığımızda hayat doluyoruz!"
